name: Create UseINBOX contacts from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Make will watch for new rows in a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet at regular intervals and add contacts to a UseINBOX mailing list using information from the sheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ESjUumFTkF2pgBLZp2RCm9mR6-WB8TAk1_hyO8bLAW8/edit?usp=sharing).
